article:
One morning Mr. Green is driving around the country and looking for a small bookshop. When he sees an old man on the side of the road, he stops his car and says to  _ old man, "Excuse me. I want to go to the Sun Bookshop. Do you know it?"
"Yes," the old man answers, "I can show you the way." He gets _ Mr. Green's car, and they drive about twelve miles  . _ they come to a small house, the old man says "Stop here." Mr. Green stops and looks at the house in front of _ . But this isn't the _ ," he says to the old man. "Right," the old man answers, "this is my house, and now I'll show you the _ to the bookshop. Turn around and go back nine miles. _ you can see the bookshop"
